title: Fresh and Co -  Madison Ave
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. NYC chain of quick service style, grab and go sandwich and salad spot; this one is across from the public library and Bryant Park. Has a Daiya grilled cheese sandwich, portobello burger, and various salads or build your own. Labels what's vegan.
